messages.subject: Tech Question
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone know -why- this page http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/ shows up on Firefox just fine but fails to show up on Explorer? I m posting little
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone know -why-
this page http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/

shows up on Firefox just fine

but fails to show up on Explorer?

I'm posting little updates on the shinsengumi LJ and it's perplexing
to see that none of the entries are visible :: SIGH ::

smart tech people can try to explain things to me at
secretarytocapt3(at)hotmail.com

I didn't design the layout so I have no idea how to solve this issue
it used to work on both firefox and explorer without a problem really

-----------------------
Announcement
-----------------------

If you are interested in "side issues"
which may involve Meiji Era discussions
and or information regarding Aizu (feudalism in general) etc
please join
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/edojidai/
recently we were discussing Fujita Goro (so all Meiji era) and there
are translations of bits of Mibugishiden (the novel by Jiro Asada)
too.
